title: 你们觉得什么类的mod好玩？
author: zimchumeng
txt_content: 我个人认为科技和冒险类的

replies.author: JiuNian
replies.txt_content: 魔法科技吧 比较耐玩 物品比较好玩

replies.author: DDkun
replies.txt_content: 魔法吧，想试试玩一下纯魔法生存

replies.author: vsvs
replies.txt_content: 冒险探索类的确，最好有专属地图和boss

replies.author: YunQian
replies.txt_content: 科技类吧 我冒险不太行
